ComicInfo.Series: DC The Doomed and the Damned
ComicInfo.Summary:
Baytor Versus Darkseid: An unlikely confrontation occurs when Darkseid visits Noonan's Bar.
Beast Boys to Men: Rivals for Raven's affections Beast Boy and Klarion must join forces to rescue her when she is abducted by a jealous Teekl.
Follow the Water: When Frankenstein and Aquaman investigate a dead Atlantean found on Mars, they must track the culprits responsible while also baby-sitting Aquaman's young daughter.
The Hunt: Orphan and Orca team up to stop a group of child traffickers.
From Humble Roots: Superman and Swamp Thing investigate a fruit-growing operation that is making people sick, and discover that Clayface has infected the fruit with his own body.
7 Days: Ra's Al Ghul uses Solomon Grundy's power of immortality to re-invigorate his own immortality, but Grundy is not happy about it.
Inner Demons: Wonder Woman and Raven battle an evil spirit who possesses an innocent woman to commit murder, but when the spirit possesses Wonder Woman, Raven must help Diana overcome it.
The Shadow over Coast City: Green Lantern battles a creature who has escaped the Sciencells on Oa and fled to Coast City, and gets help from Etrigan when the creature starts turning people into demons.
Urban Legends: At an orphanage where boys are becoming sick, one boy blames a spirit named Mr. Slowdeath, but no one believes him until Batman decides to investigate.
Grief's Quiet Name: Madame Xanadu asks Man-Bat to help investigate a ghost who is appearing to her and crying out for help.
ComicInfo.Writer: Alyssa Wong,Amanda Deibert,Amedeo Turturro,Brandon Thomas,Garth Ennis,John Arcudi,Kenny Porter,Marv Wolfman,Saladin Ahmed,Travis Moore,Garth Ennis,Travis Moore,Brandon Thomas,Alyssa Wong,Amedeo Turturro,Marv Wolfman,Amanda Deibert,Kenny Porter,Saladin Ahmed,John Arcudi
